title: Why has this not been ported to MacOS? Could you please add this capability ASAP because I would like to use TTS in my repository very soon?

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
Why has this not been ported to MacOS?  Could you please add this capability ASAP because I would like to use TTS in my repository very soon?

Example below of output.
